body.name: Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, 1080P Battery Powered AI Motion Detection Spotlight Siren Alarm WiFi Surveillance Indoor Home Camera, Color Night Vision, 2-Way Talk, Waterproof, Cloud/SD Storage

features: 【Rechargeable & Waterproof & Wire-Free】This wireless rechargeable outdoor/indoor camera can provide 1 to 5 months of worry free use for once charge. The security cameras wireless outdoor with IP65 waterproof can work in any weather. Since the WIFI cam is completely wireless, no power cords or network cable is needed, allowing install virtually anywhere with the provided, bracket and screw.

【PIR Motion Detection with AI Analysis Recognition】This outdoor camera wireless with advanced smart AI motions detection, it can clear analysis and recognition person, vehicle, pet and package. The AI PIR sensor will be triggered in real time once the outdoor security cameras detect motion, at the same time, the notification will be pushed to your phone via the app. And this security camera can be shared with multiple users.

【1080P HD Live Video, Picture & Color Night Vision】The security cameras wireless outdoor provide a degree wide angle, 1080P quality video and image. Regarding night vision, it has two modes, full color night vision and infrared night vision with a 33ft visible range. Whether it is night or day, it will provide a clear wide video of any area you wish to monitor. With the included app, the system’s live or recorded video can be accessed anywhere at any time.

【Two-Way Talk & Smart Instant Siren】This outside camera has a built-in microphone and speaker that supports real-time, two-way, audio calls. With the mobile App you can warn off thieves, screen visitors at your door or communicate directly with your family or friends. Siren, flashing white light or 2-way talk that both allow you drive away thieves and unwanted visitors.

【Cloud/SD & Free 3-Day Cycle Cloud Storage】The home security camera supports SD card and cloud storage. It provides free rolling 3-day cycled cloud storage that you can enjoy storage service without any subscription. And it provides a 30-day free trial of advanced features that include AI recognition, upgraded cloud memory, custom alert areas and etc, the advanced features starts at $2.99 per month after 30 days free trial.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Vision Well We focus on the wireless security camera, strive to share the security and convenient with you through our dependable and easy-to-use items. Wireless Rechargeable Outdoor/Indoor Security Camera Siren Alarm, 100% Wireless, AI Motion Detection, 1080P HD, Color Night Vision, 2-Way Talk and Waterproof The security cameras wireless outdoor support SD card and cloud storage. It’s waterproof and completely wireless, which can be installed in anywhere you want. It will give your home peace of mind with continuous 24 hours per day protection. One charge will provide 1-5 months battery life. Multiple users sharing, you can share this security camera with globally users 100% Wireless and IP65 waterproof, allowing it can withstand any weather and install in anywhere Three instant alarm methods: siren, flashing white light and notification push Two-way talk , you can communicate with your family and friends in a real time by camera , even you can warn off thieves AI motion detection, it can recognize person, pet, vehicle and package by AI technical 1080P HD color night vision, you can look color image and video even though it’s in the night Customize activity zones, custom monitor multiple specified areas Support cloud and SD card storage

Long Battery Life and 100% Wire-Free This outdoor camera wireless can use 1-5 months for single charge. And it’s completely wireless, you can install it in anywhere. AI Motion Detection The security cameras wireless outdoor with advanced smart AI detection that can easy identify person, pet, vehicle and package by AI technical, let you more convenience. Multiple Users Sharing This wireless camera for home security can share multiple users in globally at the same time, you can protect your home, take care your baby and pet with your family together.

Siren, Spotlight and Notification Push This outdoor security camera will siren alarm, flashing white light and push an instant of notification to your mobile app when it detects an unusual motion. These alerts will effectively drive away thieves, you can also warn off thieves by 2-way audio. Customize Activity Zones You can customize select specific activity areas to monitor through the mobile app, so you can reduce to receive lots of unnecessary push notifications. 1080P HD Color Night Vision The outside cameras security wireless with full color night vision and infrared night vision, the color night vision can provide you full color image and video than the ordinary night vision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price because it works perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: Great security camera. Really good picture. You can watch it live or you can go back and look at scenes. If you want, you can hear people and the sound quality is really nice and clear, even in the wind which was surprising. We put it on a tree in our yard. It’s very simple to attach and remove the camera part for charging and replacing it on the stand . Also it has stayed secure during the winter storms. The alarm is fun to mess with people you know! Lol. We are very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: This camera has very good video picture quality. I have not used it outside yet. I have it set up in the kitchen with a plan to find out which of my dogs counter surf for food. The speaker, if you want to send voice to the camera, is nice and loud, as well, in case you want to scold your furry friends. So far, it has just caught us wandering in and out of the kitchen. The motion detection is very good because I have over 100 video captures.The setup was very easy and I like the user interface. It's easy to review your captures and delete them on your phone. So far, the only nitpicky gripe I might have is that the button controls and charging port, which are protected on the underside by a nice weatherproof rubber cover, can be tough to access with the mount attached. It's much easier to remove the camera from the mount first, which you'd do if you have it mounted outside and need to bring it inside to charge. Again...so minor.Overall, this is a very capable web-connected camera with good quality video and audio that sends timely alerts to your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An impressive product!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is a great price and it works great. I'm always skeptical, but this is a great camera. It's easy to set up, but be aware that it will require drilling. The video is clear, even in night mode. If the camera detects motion, you can get notifications sent to your phone, which is really awesome. Personally, this is one of my favorite features. I didn't get to try the speaker function because I didn't have any visitors during the trial, but I have no reason to doubt it's functionality.I definitely recommend this camera, I've found nothing to write negatively about and it is doing its job flawlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Good Security Camera
reviews.reviewText: Ok so I am new to the remote security camera world. I bought this to try out and learn about them. The pros- It is a usb-c rechargeable battery and it last a really long time between charges its been running almost a month and still has 38 percent battery charge left.. Battery level at a glance. Fairly easy to setup. Very clear even at night and it is very sensitive to motion.Cons- they dont tell you that after the 30 day free trial you have to subscribe to get motion alerts and really anything you bought it for. Also they dont tell you in the ad that if you use the sd card that it MUST be a name brand and you cannot use a off brand(inexpensive) card. I tried not knowing until after I purchased the camera and it wont fully format the sd card.So overall I am happy with it. I just wish the ads for these things told you everything up front and what to expect but I could have done more research so it is what it is. I would recommend it if it fits your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have several cameras from a different brand but I decided to give this one a try. It was easy to setup and easy to use. Out of curiosity, I decided to just charge it and only use battery power instead of keeping it plug i in and I discovered it seems to have a really long battery life. At its current rate, I think it will hold a charge for about 5-6 weeks.It really does give a pretty good detailed live video feed and recordings. You can see everything you want to see including the night vision. The app is pretty easy to use and there are several options. What I liked about this camera over my other ones is the bracket is nicer for hanging it anywhere and then easily adjustable movement so you can have it in the exact position you want. Also, the automatic saving of recent recordings on the cloud is nice. My other service only keeps recordings up to a couple of weeks. This service seems to go by how much memory is stored and seems like it might give me a little more flexibility of time if I want.The one thing that is not quit to my liking is when you open the app, the live feed doesn’t automatically come on until you touch a play button. Some people might like this because you wouldn’t get a lag until you actually want to see the feed and so you could get to settings and options faster. But myself, if I open the app, I want to see the feed right away. I wish there was an option to change whether it came up instantly or to wait until you press the play button. They also did an app update that now constantly gives you suggestions when you start the live feed that I find annoying. I wish the suggestions could be turned off. But there are things on my other cameras I find annoying so I guess I am just picky.I would recommend this camera if you are looking for something easy to use with a good picture for a decent price.
At this price point, works just fine. Only problem is that is the WIFI requires 2.4 GHz instead of the 5 GHz. Not sure why it's like this. The camera cant transmit on the 5 GHz.
